message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.SD 

This paper is about developing a model for real-time emotion recognition in conversations using deep learning techniques. The paper focuses on addressing the problems of prior work in this area, such as the lack of compatibility between convolutional neural networks (CNNs) and memory modules, the unidirectional nature of gated recurrent units (GRUs), and the loss of positional and ordering information in memory summarization. Given these focus areas, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper are cs.CL (Computation and Language), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.CV (Computer Vision), and cs.SD (Sound).
